title: Be Still
lyrics:
Be still and know
That the Lord is in control
Be still my soul
Stand and watch as giants fall
I won't be afraid
Cause You are here

You silence all my fear



I won't be afraid

Cause You don't let go

Be still my heart and know

I won't be afraid



Be still and trust

What the Lord has said is done

Find rest don't strive

Watch as faith and grace align



I won't be afraid

Cause You don't let go

Be still my heart and know

I won't be afraid

I won't be afraid



Surely love and mercy

Your peace and kindness

Will follow me

Will follow me



Your love surrounds me

Your love surrounds me here
